headline.suffix: that makes complex things feel simple.

spotify.disclaimer: Not affiliated with Spotify. Album art and song previews are from Deezer.

origin.title: Where I'm From
origin.body: I was born and raised in the Netherlands. My parents worked hard to give me and my brother the room to figure things out. I spent countless hours behind a screen tinkering with code and games—time well spent, in hindsight.

past.title: What I Used to Do
past.body: My first jobs weren't glamorous. I stocked shelves and tried a mix of roles that taught me a lot about people. Eventually I leaned into tech—building side projects, taking on freelance work, and seeing how software could make daily work simpler.

present.title: What I Do Now
present.body: Today, I'm a mid-level software engineer working at <dictu>@DICTU</dictu>. On the side I experiment with new tools and libraries, building prototypes that make products more human and less cumbersome.

life.title: Where I'm At Now
life.body: I live in Gouda, balancing work, hobbies, and side projects. When I'm not coding, you'll usually find me at the gym (or convincing myself to go), or spending time with friends and family.

future.title: What I'm Looking For
future.body: Opportunities to build thoughtful products with great teams. I believe software should remove friction, not add it—especially for trades and small businesses. There's still plenty of old tooling waiting to be improved.

stack.title: Stack
stack.description: I like to keep things modern but practical. Here's my current stack.

dictu.alt: The logo of Dienst ICT Uitvoering

softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description:
Develop AI Chat and Assistant features.
Develop collaborative whiteboards with real-time updates.
Maintain the Zalo Mini App for Simplamo with seamless integration.
Build charting and analytics widgets to elevate dashboards.
Improve core functionality to sharpen UX.
Guard consistency across UI/UX touchpoints.
Ship resilient frontends for web and mobile.
Evaluate technical options and recommend the best path.

softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description: Supporting client projects with modern front-end tooling while coaching teams on best practices.

juniorDrupalDeveloperPartTime.title: Junior Drupal developer
juniorDrupalDeveloperPartTime.description: Helped maintain Drupal sites, implemented new features, and assisted with content migrations for clients.

juniorDrupalDeveloperInternship.title: Junior Drupal developer
juniorDrupalDeveloperInternship.description: Learned the fundamentals of Drupal development, supporting senior engineers on customer projects.

hhs.alt: Logo of The Hague University of Applied Sciences
hhs.description: Specialised in building scalable web applications with a focus on user-centric design and maintainability.

glr.alt: Logo of the Grafisch Lyceum Rotterdam
glr.description: Studied design and front-end fundamentals while gaining hands-on experience with real client projects.
